data.title: Porsche Racing Collection
data.text:
Car 1/43 Porsche 911 GT1 H-J. Stuck - T. Boutsen - B. Wollek 1996

Description:

Relive the epic 1996 Le Mans 24 Hours with this 1/43 scale miniature replica of the Porsche 911 GT1 driven by winners Hans-Joachim Stuck, Thierry Boutsen and Bob Wollek. This exquisite collector car faithfully captures the essence of this legendary racing machine, part of the Porsche Racing Collection.

Features:

- 1/43 scale

- Faithful reproduction of the victorious 1996 Porsche 911 GT1

- High-quality paintwork and details to match the racing livery

- Realistic rubber tyres for perfect grip (on the scale model, of course!)

Includes:

- 1/43 911 GT1 miniature car H-J. Stuck - T. Boutsen - B. Wollek 1996

- Leaflet with the model's technical data sheet, showing its victory in 1996 and the drivers' track records.

Don't miss the chance to add this piece of motorsport history to your Porsche Racing Collection!

Order your 1/43 911 GT1 H-J. Stuck - T. Boutsen - B. Wollek 1996 and relive the emotion of the 1996 Le Mans 24 Hours!

Note: This product is intended for adult collectors and is not a toy. Keep out of reach of children.

Car 1/43 Porsche 911 Carrera 1978 - J-P.NICOLAS - V.LAVERNE

Description:

Relive the golden age of rally car racing with this 1/43 scale miniature replica of the legendary Porsche 911 Carrera driven by Jean-Pierre Nicolas and Vincent Laverne during the 1978 Monte Carlo Rally. This exquisite collector car faithfully captures the essence of this iconic racing machine, part of the Porsche Racing Collection.

Features:

- 1/43 scale

- Faithful reproduction of the Porsche 911 Carrera from the 1978 Monte Carlo Rally

- High-quality paintwork and detailing to match the racing livery

- Realistic rubber tyres for perfect grip (on the scale model, of course!)

Includes:

- 1/43 911 Carrera 1978 model car - J-P.NICOLAS - V.LAVERNE

- Leaflet with the model's technical data sheet, including rally history and drivers' honours list.

Don't miss the chance to add this piece of motorsport history to your Porsche Racing Collection!

Order now your 1/43 911 Carrera 1978 - J-P.NICOLAS - V.LAVERNE miniature car and relive the adventure of the 1978 Monte-Carlo Rally!
